import React, {useState} from 'react' import { createItem } from '../../redux/actions/purchase/purchaseAction'; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' function Purchase() { const [itemName, setItemName] = useState(" "); const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(0); const [unitPrice, setUnitPrice] = useState(0); const formSubmitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); } return (
setItemName(e.target.value)}/>
setQuantity(e.target.value)}/>
setUnitPrice(e.target.value)}/>
setItemName(e.target.value)}/>
setQuantity(e.target.value)}/>
setUnitPrice(e.target.value)}/>
) } export default Purchase
